pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===============================ahoy===============================.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/eddiejessup/ahoy.svg :target: https://travis-ci.org/eddiejessup/ahoy.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/ahoy.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/ahoyAgent-based simulations of active particles* Free software: BSD license* Documentation: https://ahoy.readthedocs.org.Features--------* TODOHistory-------0.1.0 (2015-01-11)---------------------* First release on PyPI.
